AX0008/24 AIC RESTRICTION EDDB/BERLIN/BRANDENBURG HANDLING OF ARR AND DEP AT AD VALIDITY: 03OCT24-UFN 1. DEP FM BERLIN BRANDENBURG AP 1.1 ASSIGNMENT OF THE TKOF RWY THE ASSIGNMENT OF THE RWY FOR TKOF IS BASED ON THE FLW CONSIDERATIONS: DEP FM THE ACFT STANDS ON APN 1, 2, 2A, 3, 3A, 3B, 4, A AND E AND THE ACFT STANDS B01 TO B04 AND D01 TO D07 WILL ALWAYS BE ASSIGNED RWY 06L/24R. ALL OTHER DEP WILL ALWAYS BE ASSIGNED RWY 06R/24L. 1.2 USE OF DEP RTE FOR TKOF FM RWY 06L AND 06R, CIRCUMSTANCES REQUIRE AN INCREASED CLIMB GRADIENT (PROC DESIGN GRADIENT, PDG) TO BE MNTN ON THE NOISE-OPTIMISED DEP RTE. DUE TO THE HIGH NOISE SENSITIVITY, ALL FLT THAT CAN COMPLY WITH THESE GRADIENTS MUST, PLAN THE FLW DEP RTE: DEP FM RWY 06L ON DEP RTE IN THE DIRECTION OF SUKIP OR LOGDO WILL USE RTE WITH THE ID B. DEP FM RWY 06R ON DEP RTE IN THE DIRECTION OF SUKIP OR LOGDO WILL USE RTE WITH THE ID Q. CK PRIOR DEP NECESSARILY THE COMPLIANCE WITH THE RESTRICTION AT POBAM (F100+). IF UNA ADZ ATC PRIOR DEP IN DUE TIME. DEP FM RWY 06R ON DEP RTE IN THE DIRECTION OF GERGA, ARSAP OR LUROS WILL USE RTE WITH THE ID Q. IF, FOR AERODYNAMIC OR MET REASONS, AN ACFT PILOT IS UNA TO FULFIL THE CLIMB GRADIENT SPECIFIED IN THE DEP RTE, THIS SHALL BE COMMUNICATED AT THE START-UP APPROVAL. ONLY IN SUCH CASES DFS WILL THEN GIVE THE CLR FOR THE ALTERNATIVE DEP RTE. 1.3 INDEPENDENT DEP OPS USUALLY, TKOF FM BOTH PARL RWY TAKE PLACE INDEPENDENTLY OF EACH OTHER. CARE MUST BE TAKEN TO COMPLY WITH THE PROC EXACTLY. ANY DEVIATIONS, ESPECIALLY IN THE DIRECTION OF THE PARL RWY, MUST BE AVOIDED AT ALL COSTS. THIS ALSO APPLIES TO DEVIATIONS DUE TO MET REASONS, WHICH MAY ONLY TAKE PLACE AFT CONSULTATION WITH ATC. 2. APCH TO BERLIN BRANDENBURG AP 2.1 ASSIGNMENT OF LDG RWY THE ASSIGNMENT OF THE RWY FOR THE APCH IS BASED ON THE FLW CONSIDERATIONS: APCH FM THE ACFT STANDS ON APN 1, 2, 2A, 3, 3A, 3B, 4, A AND E AND THE ACFT STANDS B01 TO B04 AND D01 TO D07 WILL ALWAYS BE ASSIGNED RWY 06L/24R. ALL OTHER APCH WILL ALWAYS BE ASSIGNED RWY 06R/24L. DEPENDING ON THE TFC SITUATION, DEVIATIONS FM THIS DISTRIBUTION ARE POSS, ESPECIALLY IN TERMS OF LOAD BALANCING. 2.2 CHANGING FREQ TO BERLIN DIRECTOR WHEN CHANGING FREQUENCIES FM BREMEN RADAR TO BERLIN DIRECTOR, THE INITIAL CALL SHALL BE RESTRICTED TO THE CALL SIGN TO AVOID FREQ CONGESTION. 2.3 INDEPENDENT APCH OPS AS A RULE, APCH WILL BE PERFORMED IN INDEPENDENT PARL APCH OPS. THIS WILL BE ANNOUNCED THRU THE ATIS ON THE FREQ 123.780 MHZ.
SUSPENSION OF APCH PROC. RNP APCH DOWN TO LPV MINIMA SUSPENDED. REF AD 2 EDDB 4-6-1, 4-6-4, 4-6-7 AND 4-6-10 ALL EFF 03 OCT 2024.

ADS-B DATA FOR ECRA (EUROPEAN CONNECTED REGIONAL AIRPORTS PROGRAMME) OPERATIONS. 1.1.IN ORDER TO COOPERATE WITH ADS-B RECEIVER USED BY AIRPORT OPERATOR AND EUROCONTROL FOR USE OF THE ECRA PROGRAMME AT EINDHOVEN AIRPORT,PILOTS OF MODE S EQUIPPED ACFT WITH ADS-B FUNCTIONALITIES WHEN OPERATING ON THE GROUND SHALL: A)SELECT AUTO MODE AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE OR B)IF AUTOMODE IS NOT AVAILABLE, SELECT ON (E.G.XPDR) AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE. -FROM THE REQUEST FOR TOWER PUSH-BACK OR TAXI,WHICHEVER IS EARLIER -AFTER LANDING,CONTINUOUSLY UNTIL THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED IN ITS STAND. -WHEN THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED, FLT CREW SHALL SELECT STBY. 1.1.2.WHENEVER THE ACFT IS CAPABLE OF REPORTING ACFT IDENTIFICATION (I.E.CALLSIGN USED IN FLT), THIS SHOULD BE ENTERED (THROUGH THE FMS OR THE TRANSPONDER CONTROL PANEL) AT THE TIME OF THE REQUEST FOR TOWED PUSH-BACK OR TAXI, WHICHEVER IS EARLIER. 1.1.3.AIR CREW MUST USE THE ICAO DEFINED FORMAT TO ENTER THE ACFT IDENTIFICATION. 1.1.4.TO ENSURE THAT THE PERFORMANCE OF SYSTEMS BASED ON SSR FREQ (INCLUDING AIRBORNE TCAS AND SSR RADARS) IS NOT COMPROMISED, TCAS SHOULD NOT BE SELECTED BEFORE RECEIVING CLEARANCE TO LINE UP, AND SHOULD BE DESELECTED AFTER VACATING THE RWY.
ILS OM RWY 06. CHECK DME-READING ADDN. MARKER NOT REMOTE CONTROLLED.

MILITARY INVASION OF UKRAINE BY RUSSIAN FEDERATION. REROUTINGS, EXTENDED ROUTE PORTIONS BELOW FL245 AND DELAY MAY BE EXPECTED WITHIN LOWER AND UPPER GERMAN AIRSPACE DUE TO AIRSPACE RESTRICTIONS FOR THE EXECUTION OF MILITARY MISSIONS. IT IS RECOMMENDED TO CONSIDER THE USE OF EXTRA-FUEL.

KARLSRUHE UAC USES THE EUROCONTROL LOGON LIST TO STABILIZE CPDLC PERFORMANCE. ALL LOGON LISTED ACFT SHALL LOG ON TO KARLSRUHE UAC. DATA LINK ADDRESS OF KARLSRUHE UAC IS EDUU. NOT LOGON LISTED ACFT SHALL NOT TRY TO LOGON TO EDUU. LOGON FORWARDING FOR NOT LOGON LISTED ACFT WILL NOT BE PERFORMED. ALL OPERATORS ARE INVITED TO APPLY FOR LOGON LIST ENTRY VIA THE PUBLISHED EUROCONTROL PROCESS (AIP GERMANY PAGES GEN 3.4-70 THRU GEN 3.4-75 REFER).
OVERFLIGHT PROHIBITED 0.2NM RADIUS CENTERED ON 510312N 0062134E, ERKELENZ (20.3NM SW DUESSELDORF VOR/DME DUS) DUE TO BOMB DISPOSAL.
GPS UNRELIABLE AND MAY BE NOT AVBL IN EASTERN PART OF FIR EDWW.

SX0007/24 AIC RESTRICTION CONTRAIL PREVENTION TRIAL - MAASTRICHT UAC (EDYY) AIRSPACE VALIDITY:01AUG24-28FEB25 IN AN EFFORT TO MINIMISE THE IMPACT OF AVIATION ON THE ENVIRONMENT, MAASTRICHT UAC WILL BE RUNNING A CONTRAIL PREVENTION TRIAL. FLT MAY BE TACTICALLY REQ TO DEVIATE FM THE PLANNED/REQ FL BY THE SECT CONTROLLER USING PHRASEOLOGY: FOR CONTRAIL PREVENTION CLIMB/DESCEND.ANY FLT FLY VIA MAASTRICHT UAC SECT BTN THESE TIMES MAY BE CHOSEN.THE TRIAL WILL GO AHEAD DEPENDENT ON THE WEATHER COND

SX0029/20 AIP SUPPLEMENT EDVV/HANNOVER UIR, EDUU/RHEIN UIR VALIDITY: 06OCT22 - 30SEP27 FLIGHT OPERATIONS WITH MILITARY UAS RESTRICTED AREA: ED-R GH 470FL/660FL (CORRIDOR) IN THE ABOVE-MENTIONED AREA, ALL FLIGHTS EXCEPT FOR UNMANNED MILITARY FLIGHTS MAY ONLY BE CONDUCTED WITH A CLEARANCE FROM THE COMPETENT AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL UNIT. REQUESTS TO CROSS THE AREA CAN BE MADE VIA RADIOTELEPHONY. ED-D GH SEGMENT C 470FL/660FL ED-D GH SEGMENT N 470FL/660FL ALL PILOTS ARE URGENTLY REQUESTED TO AVOID THE DANGER AREAS.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: AX0006/24 AIC RESTRICTION EHAA/AMSTERDAM FIR VALIDITY: 25JUL24 - UFN USE OF 3.4 - 3.8 GHZ BAND FOR 5G NETWORKS IN THE AMSTERDAM FIR. OPERATORS ARE ENCOURAGED TO FOLLOW ANY RECOMMENDATIONS COMING FROM EASA AND THEIR ACFT OR RADIO ALTIMETER MANUFACTURERS ON THE SUBJECT. PILOTS WHO EXPERIENCE RADIO ALTIMETER ANOMALIES SHOULD INFORM AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL AS SOON AS PRACTICALLY POSSIBLE TO ALLOW APPROPRIATE OPERATIONAL MEASURES TO BE TAKEN WHEN NECESSARY.

Paragraph.Text: GNSS JAMMING AND SPOOFING OCCURRENCES HAVE BEEN REPORTED WITHIN FIR EPWW. AIR CREWS TO REMAIN VIGILANT AND TO REPORT TO ATS. CONVENTIONAL NAVIGATION AIDS AVAILABLE.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: DUE TO THE CRISIS SITUATION IN UKRAINE, UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE, THE FOLLOWING FLIGHT PLANNING RESTRICTIONS ARE INTRODUCED IN EPWW FIR: 1. ACC WARSZAWA SECTORS: EPWWNL, EPWWNH, EPWWEL, EPWWEH: ARE NOT AVAILABLE FOR TRAFFIC VIA POINTS ENOBI, GORAT, RUDKA, ABERO BTN FL205 AND FL385. THIS TRAFFIC CAN BE PLANNED VIA POINT SOTET

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: OAT TFC (ESPECIALLY TRANSITS) ABOVE 4500FT AMSL PPR MANDATORY. REQUESTS DAY-1 SHALL BE ADDRESSED TO MIL SUPERVISOR VIA LARA AIRSPACE BOOKING TOOL OR TEL +32(0)24438204. ALL FOREIGN OAT TFC REQUESTING TSA BOOKING SHOULD ADHERE TO PROCEDURES IN AIP BELGIUM AND LUXEMBOURG ENR 5.2.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: SX0060/22 AIP SUPPLEMENT EBBU/FIR - RESTRICTIONS RELATED TO THE RUSSIAN INVASION OF UKRAINE - 08SEP22-UFN 1 AVOIDANCE OF OPERATIONS IN THE CRISIS AREA BELGIAN AIR OPERATORS AND OWNERS OF AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN BELGIUM SHALL NOT ENTER UKBU, UKLV, UKBV, UKDV, UKFV, UKOV, URRV. FLIGHT OPERATIONS SHALL ALSO BE AVOIDED WITHIN THE BUFFER ZONE EXTENDING OUT TO 200 NM ALONG THE UKRAINE/RUSSIA BORDER. OPERATIONS WITHIN LUUU SHALL ONLY BE UNDERTAKEN IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE APPLICABLE AERONAUTICAL PUBLICATIONS ISSUED BY THE REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA. ADDITIONAL RISK ASSESSMENT AND FLIGHT PLANNING DECISIONS SHALL BE TAKEN BEFORE OPERATING UUWV. 2 RESTRICTIONS FOR RUSSIAN OPERATORS LL RUSSIAN REGISTERED AIRCRAFT AND AIRCRAFT OWNED, CHARTERED OR OPERATED, OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED BY NATURAL OR LEGAL PERSONS FROM THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION OR BY OPERATORS HOLDING AN AIR OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION AUTHORITIES ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, EXIT OR OVERFLY BELGIAN AND LUXEMBOURGISH AIRSPACE, EXCEPT FOR HUMANITARIAN, SAR AND LEASED AIRCRAFT ONE-WAY RETURN FLIGHTS WITH THE PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE BELGIAN OR LUXEMBOURGISH AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LANDING OR EMERGENCY OVERFLIGHT.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: RESTRICTED AREA EDR312 TRA KLEVE DEACTIVATED.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: AX0009/24 AIC RESTRICTION EBBU/BRUSSELS FIR CONTRAIL PREVENTION TRIAL - MAASTRICHT UAC (EDYY) AIRSPACE VALIDITY: 05SEP24-28FEB25 IN AN EFFORT TO MINIMISE THE IMPACT OF AVIATION ON THE ENVIRONMENT, MAASTRICHT UAC WILL BE RUNNING A CONTRAIL PREVENTION TRIAL. FLIGHTS MAY BE TACTICALLY REQUESTED TO DEVIATE FROM THE PLANNED/REQUESTED FL BY THE SECTOR CONTROLLER USING PHRASEOLOGY: FOR CONTRAIL PREVENTION CLIMB/DESCEND. ANY FLIGHT FLYING VIA MAASTRICHT UAC SECTORS MAY BE CHOSEN. THE TRIAL WILL GO AHEAD DEPENDENT ON THE WEATHER CONDITIONS. FOR TACTICAL ENQUIRIES CTC MAASTRICHT UAC 0031 43 366 1428
